Antonio Drumond Cota de Sousa - 855947

01a.)
	a.) 0.00011(2) = 2^-4 + 2^-5 = 0.0625 + 0.03125 = 0.09375(10)
	b.) 0.01001(2) = 2^-2 + 2^-5 = 0.25 + 0.03125 = 0.28125(10)
	c.) 0.10101(2) = 2^-1 + 2^-3 + 2^-5 = 0.5 + 0.125 + 0.03125 = 0.65625(10)
	d.) 1.11101(2) = 1 + 2^-1 + 2^-2 + 2^-3 + 2^-5 = 1 + 0.5 + 0.25 + 0.125 + 0.03125 = 1.90625(10)
	e.)11.11001(2) = 2 + 1 + 2^-1 + 2^-2 + 2^-5 = 2 + 1 + 0.5 + 0.25 0.03125 = 3.78125(10) 

02a.)
	a.) 0.375000(10) = 0.25 + 0.125 = 2^-2 + 2^-3 = 0.0110(2)
	b.) 2.125000(10) = 2 + 0.125 = 2^1 + 2^-3 = 10.0010(2)
	c.) 3.625000(10) = 2 + 1 + 0.5 + 0.125 = 2^1 + 2^0 + 2^-1 + 2^-3 = 11.1010(2)
	d.) 5.03125(10)  = 4 + 1 + 0.03125 = 2^2 + 2^0 + 2^-5 = 101.00001(2)
	e.) 6.75000(10)  = 4 + 2 + 0.5 + 0.25 = 2^2 + 2^1 + 2^-1 + 2^-2 = 110.1100(2)

03.a)
	a.) 0,011110(2) = 0,132(4)
	b.) 0.101001(2) = 0.51(8)
	c.) 0.100110(2) = 0.98(16)
	d.) 1.111011(2) = 1,73(8)
	e.) 1101.1001(2) = D,9(16)

04.a)
	a.) 0.321(4) = 0.111001(2)
	b.) 0.3D2(16) = 0.0011 1101 0010(2) = 0.033102(4)
	c.) 0.751(8) = 0.111101001(2)
	d.) 7.345(8) = 0111.0111001010(2) = 13.13022(4)
	e.) F,A5E(16) = 33,221132(4)

5a.)
	a.) 101.11 + 10.011 = 1000.001 
	b.) 1000.101 - 10.01 = 0110.0110
	c.) 101.101 * 10.101 = 1110.110001
	d.) 10111.010 / 00011.011 = 00000110.11100100
	e.) 1101011 % 1101 = 11
